>
[Natural Performer](/Feats.aspx?ID=991) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 32 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Entertainment comes naturally to you. You become trained in [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) and gain one 1st-level Performance skill feat.
name: Natural Performer
